MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG1 and DG12 postcode areas of Dumfries and Annan. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut and are working to get supplies restored. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and our  team are still onsite and confirmed there is an underground cable fault near Moss-Side. We are bringing a generator to site to restore supply to our customers still without power and we expect your supply to be restored by 8.30pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:24PM on Sunday 24 January 2021.
